HierDmap 0.5.0

Reference

All functions

dDivgeomap()

Plot diversity plot in a biodiversity geographic map.

dgDivgeomap()

Diversity-density geographic map.

Dprofile

Diversity profiles (Dq0, Dq1, Dq2) of HGDP data with longitude and latitude.

eHGDP

HGDP-CEPH dataset

ggDivgeomap()

Geo-biodiversity profile distribution map

HierDgenind()

Calculateing genetic diversity profiles (based on Hill numbers) and diversity in a hierarchy.

HierDplot

Plotting hierarchical diversity

HierDq()

Calculating hierarchical diversity based on Hill numbers

HierDstr

Formating the hierarchial diversity data structure used for plotting

HierDstrp()

Formating the hierarchial diversity data structure for "HierDgenlind" function" used for plotting

normalize()

Normalze the data between 0-1.

PlothieD()

Plotting an interactive diversity map in a hierarchy

rDivgeomap()

Method of plot geographic diveristy map in R
